body_html:
@mrry this fails the windows build, but passes everything else. Presumably https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/patches/grpc/CMakeLists.txt needs to be updated.

Not planning to learn cmake at the moment :) Derek, how do you want to proceed?
